reasoning: Umbrella term encompassing both benign and malignant oral neoplasms. Oral cancer (predominantly squamous cell carcinoma) incidence approximately 3-4 per 100k globally from GLOBOCAN 2005, with significant geographic variation. Confidence reduced from potential 0.8+ due to heterogeneity of benign tumors included in broader category.
source: Ferlay J et al. (2004). GLOBOCAN 2002: Cancer Incidence, Mortality and Prevalence Worldwide. IARC CancerBase No. 5, Version 2.0
